p: The Encyclical is guided by super-ordinate norms defined as “categories which transcend the language of mathematics and biology […], intellectual appreciation or economic calculus” (Enc., 11). Summarized under the ethical notion of “love” (Enc., 77) for nature and humankind macro-level norms in the Encyclical countervail the allegedly prevailing “techno-economic paradigm” (Enc., 53, 203), more prominent in the PA and the SDGs.
